attributes.action: create a English parliement for the country of England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: is it fair that the welsh,scottish and Irish have their own parliement and national assemblys.Decide their own taxes and laws?And yet this denied to the english.NO welshman,scotsman or Irishman should be making decisions that affect english policy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
